summary: "TAKATA RECALL" I RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE IN THE MAIL IN MARCH - ALMOST 4 MONTHS AGO. I ALREADY WAS AWARE OF THIS ISSUE BECAUSE OF AN ARTICLE PRINTED IN MY LOCAL NEWSPAPER IN 2016 AND HAD VERIFIED MY CAR HAD BEEN AFFECTED VIA MY VIN.  I BELIEVE IT IS PAST TIME FOR GM FIX MY CAR.  PLEASE RESPOND AND LET ME KNOW WHERE I SHOULD TAKE MY CAR TO FIX THIS PROBLEM
